FlavorText.Text: Well, well, well. What do we have here? Someone has gone and tried to organize a new realm eh? The world has changed. You will soon learn that.
So you're [L_LeaderName]? You will wish you had never been born when the wilds are done with you.
What's this we have here? Someone is trying to gather the peasant folk to form a society? I don't think so.
Your little village of [CITYNAME] isn't even defended. Perhaps it will do better under new management.
Look at that, the little town of [CITYNAME] hasn't even trained a bloody peasant to defend its gates. Don't worry, we'll be there soon.
Looks like dinner is coming to me today.
This land belongs to me!
Stay away from my stuff!
These lands belong to the syndicate.
What do we have here? Another would-be adventurer?
This is Syndicate territory.
You have some nice gear. I can't wait to take it from you.
This is our turf, find your own area.
I hear the jingle of gildar. Come closer.
Come to my abode for a visit. I won't harm you. Much.
Ah, another visitor. Stay awhile. Stay..forever.
I sense there is a power in you. A power I would take.
You trespass on our hunting grounds. You must pay the price.
The time of cities is over. The world is ours now.
It has shinies. Maybe we can take the shinies from it.
Your gear will fetch a pretty gildar.
Your gear will fetch a pretty gildar.
Look at you, lording through the wilds as if you own them!
